bug.author: liuzx32
bug.description: [ERROR] Failed to execute goal on project alluxio-core-server-common: Could not resolve dependencies for project org.alluxio:alluxio-core-server-common:jar:2.0.0-SNAPSHOT: The following artifacts could not be resolved: io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-server:jar:1.2.12, io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-client:jar:1.2.12: Could not find artifact io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-server:jar:1.2.12

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/liuzx32>@liuzx32</denchmark-link> Thanks for reporting this issue. Could you also share the command you used to compile the project?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/calvinjia>@calvinjia</denchmark-link> mvn -U clean install -DskipTests <denchmark-h:h1></denchmark-h>
The jar io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-server:jar:1.2.12 is not in the maven repo. I can't find io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-server:jar:1.2.12 in other maven public repo. Where should I find the jar io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-server:jar:1.2.12 for alluxio-2.0.0?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/liuzx32>@liuzx32</denchmark-link> Could you also provide the version of maven that you're using?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/ZacBlanco>@ZacBlanco</denchmark-link> maven 3.5.4 <denchmark-h:h1></denchmark-h>
$mvn -v Apache Maven 3.5.4 (1edded0938998edf8bf061f1ceb3cfdeccf443fe; 2018-06-18T02:33:14+08:00) Maven home: /usr/local/maven Java version: 1.8.0_151, vendor: Oracle Corporation, runtime: /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/jdk1.8.0_151.jdk/Contents/Home/jre Default locale: zh_CN, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "10.14", arch: "x86_64", family: "mac"

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/liuzx32>@liuzx32</denchmark-link> , the copycat jar is located in the static website of S3 bucket. The place that we defind the jar address is in : <denchmark-code> <repository> <id>alluxio.artifacts</id> <url>http://alluxio.artifacts.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/release</url> </repository> </denchmark-code>
Listing and reading objects do not require aws keys. If maven is unable to download the jar directly, could you try to see if you can directly open the page <denchmark-link:url>http://alluxio.artifacts.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/release/io/atomix/copycat/alluxio/copycat-server/1.2.12/copycat-server-1.2.12.jar</denchmark-link>
and download the jar. Thanks
I tested building the master branch on a clean machine and the maven build process completes for me
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/LuQQiu>@LuQQiu</denchmark-link> Thanks for the jar, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apc999>@apc999</denchmark-link> Thank you very much.

Hi @liuzx32, the copycat jar is located in the static website of alluxio.artifacts S3 bucket. The place that we defind the jar address is in alluxio/pom.xml: <repository> <id>alluxio.artifacts</id> <url>http://alluxio.artifacts.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/release</url> </repository>
Listing and reading objects do not require aws keys. If maven is unable to download the jar directly, could you try to see if you can directly open the page http://alluxio.artifacts.s3-website-us-east-1.amazonaws.com/release/io/atomix/copycat/alluxio/copycat-server/1.2.12/copycat-server-1.2.12.jar and download the jar. Thanks
Still failed! The linked jar may has problem. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/liuzx32>@liuzx32</denchmark-link> how did you fix this? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zhipcui>@zhipcui</denchmark-link> @apc999 how to fix "Cannot resolve io.atomix.copycat.alluxio:copycat-client:1.2.14" ? where is this jar in maven rep?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/apc999>@apc999</denchmark-link>
I got the error similar to the error as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zhipcui>@zhipcui</denchmark-link> when compiling the source code tagged 2.1.0 after I downloaded the copycat jar and install it by myself. <denchmark-code>[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.2:compile (default-compile) on project alluxio-core-server-common: Compilation failure: Compilation failure: [ERROR] /home/ubuntu/code/alluxio/core/server/common/src/main/java/alluxio/master/journal/raft/RaftJournalSystem.java:[36,37] package io.atomix.catalyst.serializer does not exist [ERROR] /home/ubuntu/code/alluxio/core/server/common/src/main/java/alluxio/master/journal/raft/RaftJournalSystem.java:[37,36] package io.atomix.catalyst.transport does not exist [ERROR] /home/ubuntu/code/alluxio/core/server/common/src/main/java/alluxio/master/journal/raft/RaftPrimarySelector.java:[17,37] package io.atomix.catalyst.concurrent does not exist [ERROR] /home/ubuntu/code/alluxio/core/server/common/src/main/java/alluxio/master/journal/raft/RaftJournalSystem.java:[278,23] cannot find symbol [ERROR] symbol: class Address [ERROR] location: class alluxio.master.journal.raft.RaftJournalSystem </denchmark-code>
It seemes that I lacked the dependency of io.atomix.catalyst and actually it is. So i tried to find the definition of this dependency but I got nothing. I wonder where the dependency defines or which dependency contains it since I need to know the version to add it to my repository.

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/jinhang>@jinhang</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sunweihao>@sunweihao</denchmark-link> You can manually download jars list as below or fixed network problem [ as you know, GFW]
copycat-client-1.2.12.jar copycat-protocol-1.2.12.jar copycat-server-1.2.12.jar
